***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Borrowed from Classical_Persian تا‎ (tā), from Middle_Persian [script needed]
(OD /⁠tā⁠/, “until, so that”), from Old_Persian 𐎹𐎠𐎫𐎠 (y-a-t-a /⁠yātā⁠/).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /t̪ɑː/, [t̪äː]
**** Preposition[edit] ****
ता • (tā) (Urdu spelling تا‎)
   1. (rare, poetic) until
            Synonym: तक (tak)
            ता-क़यामत ― tā-qayāmat ― until Doomsday, until eternity
***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [ta]
**** Noun[edit] ****
ता • (tā) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐟𑐵)
   1. bridge
*** Alternative forms[edit] ***
    * तां (tāṃ)
***** Pali[edit] *****
**** Alternative forms[edit] ****
Alternative forms
    * tā (Latin script)
    * 𑀢𑀸 (Brahmi script)
    * তা (Bengali script)
    * තා (Sinhalese script)
    * တာ or တႃ (Burmese script)
    * ตา (Thai script)
    * ᨲᩣ (Tai Tham script)
    * ຕາ (Lao script)
    * តា (Khmer script)
    * 𑄖𑄂 (Chakma script)
**** Adjective[edit] ****
ता (tā)
   1. (demonstrative) Devanagari_script form of tā, which is feminine
      nominative/accusative plural of त (ta, “that”)
**** Pronoun[edit] ****
ता f
   1. Devanagari_script form of tā (“she”)

Case \ Number        Singular                       Plural
Nominative (first)   सा (sā)                        ता (tā)
Accusative (second)  तं (taṃ)                       ता (tā)
Instrumental (third) ताय (tāya)                     ताहि (tāhi) or ताभि (tābhi)
                     ताय (tāya) or तस्सा (tassā) or तासं (tāsaṃ) or तासानं
Dative (fourth)      तिस्सा (tissā) or तिस्साय      (tāsānaṃ)
                     (tissāya)
Ablative (fifth)     ताय (tāya)                     ताहि (tāhi) or ताभि (tābhi)
                     ताय (tāya) or तस्सा (tassā) or तासं (tāsaṃ) or तासानं
Genitive (sixth)     तिस्सा (tissā) or तिस्साय      (tāsānaṃ)
                     (tissāya)
Locative (seventh)   ताय (tāya) or तायं (tāyaṃ) or  तासु (tāsu)
                     तिस्सं (tissaṃ)
